control.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(FileMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(USE_Category-5) | Skin.HasSetting(VideoBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(AudioBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(PictureBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(MovieLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(TVLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(MusicLibraryMode-5)] + !Skin.HasSetting(DisableButton-5)

control.label: Enable File Mode
control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(MovieLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(TVLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(MusicLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(USE_Category-5) | Skin.HasSetting(VideoBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(AudioBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(PictureBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(DisableButton-5)

control.label: Enable Category File Mode
control.visible: Skin.HasSetting(MovieLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(TVLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(MusicLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(FileMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(VideoBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(AudioBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(PictureBookmarkMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(DisableButton-5)

control.label: Enable Video Bookmark Mode
control.visible: [Skin.HasSetting(MovieLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(TVLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(MusicLibraryMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(FileMode-5) | Skin.HasSetting(USE_Category-5)] | [Skin.HasSetting(VideoBookmarkMode-5) + Skin.HasSetting(DisableButton-5)] | [!Skin.HasSetting(VideoBookmarkMode-5) + !Skin.HasSetting(AudioBookmarkMode-5) + !Skin.HasSetting(PictureBookmarkMode-5) + Skin.HasSetting(DisableButton-5)]
